title:
Instructions: In a large pot, bring water to a boil then stir in macaroni. Cook until al dente, drain, and set aside. Toss it in a little olive oil to avoid sticking.
Peel and de-pit 1 or 2 avocados (honestly depending on how much you love avocados), and cut them into chunks. Place them in a food processor with lime juice, cilantro, and salt and pepper, and blend until creamy and consistent in texture.
In a small pan, melt butter over medium heat then whisk in flour and milk until smooth. Once the milk has reduced and thickened, stir in cheese until the sauce is melted. For extra cheesiness (but without the calories), add in some nutritional yeast.
Pour the avocado mixture over the bowl of macaroni and stir be
directions: In a large pot, bring water to a boil then stir in macaroni. Cook until al dente, drain, and set aside. Toss it in a little olive oil to avoid sticking.

Peel and de-pit 1 or 2 avocados (honestly depending on how much you love avocados), and cut them into chunks. Place them in a food processor with lime juice, cilantro, and salt and pepper, and blend until creamy and consistent in texture.

In a small pan, melt butter over medium heat then whisk in flour and milk until smooth. Once the milk has reduced and thickened, stir in cheese until the sauce is melted. For extra cheesiness (but without the calories), add in some nutritional yeast.
